title: Travel Planner
text: Partnered with 4 other developers to create a trip search engine using 3 APIs

title: Password Generator
text: Created a means for users to generate random passwords with specified criteria

title: Day Planner with Weather Update
text: Used Moment.js, local storage, and a weather API to create a scheduling app

title: Burger App
text: Deployed a food ordering app on Heroku with MySQL and Handlebars

title: Team Directory
text: Developed a Command Line Interface for creating a team profile webpage with Handlebars

title: ReadMe Generator
text: Created a command line interface for developers to make formatted ReadMe files

title: Workout App
text: Created a fitness app to track daily workouts using a Mongoose database

title: Budget Tracker
text: Designed a budget app that allows offline records to be synced later with Mongo database
